{{disambig-more: '''Tim Tolkien''' (b. [[13 October]] [[1962]]) is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s great-nephew, the son of [[Julian Tolkien]], [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s son. He has a brother named Nick.
Tim Tolkien is a successful sculptor.
